title: WEB SERIES Call for Entries New Media Film Festival
desc: SUBMIT ABOVE FOR 7th Annual New Media Film Festival WEB SERIES 2016 YOU ARE SUBMITTING FOR: WEB OR MOBILE SERIES  - Web and Mobile Series are very similar to TV series. When you film at least 3 episodes, you are?officially a series in the digital space. Web Series and Mobile Series may be created on any media (HD, 35mm, Super8, etc.)? Content may include narrative, documentary?and experimental material in any genre. NOTE: Each episode in the series must be under 20 minutes. If your episodes are longer than 20 minutes each, please submit into the shorts category.? New Media Film Festival reviews only 3 episodes from any one title submitted. Each submission is considered for Screening, Competition ($45,000.00 in Awards) and/or Distribution? By Submitting, you?have read and agree to the terms in the link below:? TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR SUBMITTING TO NEW MEDIA FILM FESTIVAL Sorry no Refunds.
